Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "+spawn 3.0\\r\\n\\r\\nThe +spawn command is used to spawn objects somewhere, by default into your own inventory. It can take a variety of options, and supports a thing called aliasing. \\r\\n\\r\\nObjects in a game may have aliases, which work somewhat like \\"shortcuts\\". Scrolls, for instance, may have the alias \\"scroll\\" which lets you type +spawn scroll instead of +spawn NPC:misc:scroll.\\r\\n\\r\\nAreas may also have aliases, which allow you to e.g. +spawn scroll into courtyard, instead of whatever woename the courtyard may have.\\r\\n\\r\\nThere are two types of aliases to +spawn:\\r\\n- global: these are available to everyone on the server.\\r\\n- private: these are available only to the account of the person creating them.\\r\\n\\r\\nWhen creating a global alias, write the name of the alias in capital letters. That is, the following alias definition is private:\\r\\n +spawn scroll=NPC:misc:scroll\\r\\nAnd this one is global/public:\\r\\n +spawn SCROLL=NPC:misc:scroll\\r\\n\\r\\nWhen both a private and global definition for the same alias exists, the private is used.\\r\\n\\r\\nAliases MAY contain spaces. \\"ob courtyard\\" is a valid alias, for instance.\\r\\n\\r\\n(Note: the syntax for +spawn changed as of Dec 27, 2005, when it was converted into a raw verb.)"

"+spawn scroll\\r\\n Spawn a scroll into your inventory.\\r\\n\\r\\n+spawn 5 scroll into harry\\r\\n Put 5 scrolls into the character Harry's inventory.\\r\\n\\r\\n+spawn scroll into Marrach:rooms:outer:ground:OuterCourtyard\\r\\n Put 1 scroll into Marrach:rooms:outer:ground:OuterCourtyard.\\r\\n\\r\\n+spawn 5 NPC:misc:scroll into ob courtyard\\r\\n Create 5 \ objects and place them in the object aliased as \\"ob courtyard\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+spawn coffee=Generic:drink:mug-coffee\\r\\n Set up the PRIVATE (for your account only) alias \\"coffee\\" to point at \\"Generic:drink:mug-coffee\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+spawn COFFEE=Generic:drink:mug-coffee\\r\\n Set up the GLOBAL (for everybody on this server) alias \\"coffee\\" to point at \\"Generic:drink:mug-coffee\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+spawn list\\r\\n List all aliases on this server."
